text: Let ‘@’ is a 2x3 integer array with size of integer is 4byte. Which of the following is correct three address code for the expression c+a [i]f]? G )] t1=i*12 t1=i%3 2=j*4 2=j*4 B=tl+t2 3=t +t2 t=c+t3 4 = a[t3] @ @ t1=i*12 t1=i*12 2=j*4 ©2=j*3 B=tl+t2 3=t +t2 4 = a[t3] 4 = a[t3] S=cttd t5=c+t4
